newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuelan bolivar ends flat at 476/476.75 dlr.
newsitem.headline: Venezuelan bolivar ends flat at 476/476.75 dlr.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed flat at 476.00/476.75 bolivars per dollar in light dealing with the spread between offer and demand narrowing slightly, brokers said.
"The market was quiet, same as in recent days, with some modest Central Bank presence," one trader said.
Most brokers expect the parity not to fluctuate significantly until January 15, when the market wakes up with the return of major corporate trading.
